Two\\\",\\\"role\\\":\\\"customer\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Concurrent customer used to simulate realistic demand and race conditions.\\\"},{\\\"actorKey\\\":\\\"adversary\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Adversarial User\\\",\\\"role\\\":\\\"malicious_actor\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Actor intentionally attempting unauthorized or authenticates\\\",\\\"actorKey\\\":\\\"biz_owner\\\",\\\"intent\\\":\\\"Establish authenticated owner identity for the lifecycle.\\\",\\\"instruction\\\":\\\"Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes

requestBody.title: Owner signs up and authenticates API Trace

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
